overview: Valentin reaches Mexico City to stay with his countrymen Marcelo and Sirenia,  parents of thirteen  children. Marcelo  gladly serves Valentin until he realizes that he is poor and throws him out of the house. By a suggestion Sirenia, Marcelo employs Valentin as a servant and exploits it mercilessly. But with the help of Andres, the fate of Valentin takes an unexpected turn.
title: El Ceniciento
